metadata.Title: CVE-2020-35376 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.Description: Xpdf 4.02 allows stack consumption because of an incorrect subroutine reference in a Type 1C font charstring, related to the FoFiType1C::getOp() function.

notes.Note: jdstrand> xpdf in koffice is 2.0 mdeslaur> no indication poppler is affected

criterions.comment: ipe package in hirsute is affected and may need fixing.
xpdf package in hirsute is affected and may need fixing.
